subtasks: Approach the garden bed
Bend down to reach the soil
Scoop soil into a planting hole
Place a flower stem into the hole
Backfill the hole with soil
Gently press the soil around the stem
Water the newly planted flower
Locate the umbrella base
Bend down to access the mechanism
Unscrew or release the umbrella canopy
Rotate the umbrella into a desired position
Secure the umbrella in place
Approach the driveway
Kneel or squat to locate debris
Grasp the debris with gloved hands
Lift the debris and carry it to a bin
Dispose of the debris in the bin
Position lawn mower at the beginning of a grassy area
Lift the mower onto grass
Press down on the mower to start cutting
Push the mower forward along the grass
Turn the mower around at the end of the area
Repeat mowing in parallel lines
Check for any missed patches and repeat
Retrieve a feed container
Approach the animal enclosure
Lower the container to the animal's level
Open the container and pour out a portion
Monitor the animal's reaction to the feed
Distribute the feed evenly in the enclosure

tasks.task: Installing a gate onto a fence
subtasks: Position the gate at the correct opening
Align the gate with the fence posts
Lift the gate and slide it onto the posts
Secure the gate hinges to the posts
Check the gate for stability and adjust if needed
